Package model.comment

Class CommentManager

java.lang.Object
model.Manager
model.comment.CommentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeObservable
public class CommentManager
extends Manager
CommentManager is responsible for executing all the commands needed for the application that are related to comments.

Remark that it is implemented with the singleton pattern, so only one instance of it exists.

Author:
Bori Fazakas

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CommentManager getInstance()

    • addComment

      public void addComment​(java.lang.String text, int projectId) throws NoSignedInUserException, InexistentProjectException, java.sql.SQLException, InexistentDatabaseEntityException, InexistentTeamException, UnauthorisedOperationException
      Adds a new comment to project with id projectId, from the current user, with the content text.
      Parameters:
      text - is the content of the new comment.
      projectId - is the id of the project to which it will belong.
      Throws:
      NoSignedInUserException - if there is noone signed in.
      InexistentProjectException - if there is no project with id projectId.
      java.sql.SQLException - if the operation could not be performed in the database.
      InexistentDatabaseEntityException - should never occur.
      InexistentTeamException - if the team wo which the project belongs is not found in the database.
      UnauthorisedOperationException - if the current user is not the member of the team to which the project with projectId belongs.

    • getOrderedCommentsOfProject

      public java.util.List<Comment> getOrderedCommentsOfProject​(int projectId) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Finds and returns from the database a list of all comments belonging to a a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - is the id of the project whose comments are listed.
      Returns:
      a list of all comments belonging to a a project.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the operation could not be performed in the database.
